surface_layer.definition: Economic activity that results from billions of online connections among people, businesses, devices, data, and processes.

deep_layer.mechanism: The digital economy relies on the internet, cloud computing, mobile devices, and data analytics to create new business models and improve efficiency.
deep_layer.origin: Emerged with the proliferation of the internet and related technologies.

core_premise: Digital technologies drive economic growth and innovation.
